comments:
Configuration:

PDT All-In-One 20070712 (linux gtk version) + PDE (installed via Update Manager using Europa site)
IBM JDK 5.0
SimplyMEPIS 6.0 - Linux 2.6.15-27-686

Setup:

a) open PHP Perspective
b) switch to PHP Explorer
c) create a Working Set to collect some workspace projects
d) View Menu > Show > Working Sets
e) View Menu > Configure Working Sets... > choose set > OK

Steps to reproduce NPE:

a) open Plug-in Development Perspective
b) switch to Package Explorer
c) View Menu > Top Level Elements > Working Sets
d) View Menu > Configure Working Sets... > choose set previously created for in PHP Explorer view > OK
e) Note NPE error message. Note also that the new sets don't have icons when shown in the Pakcage Explorer or in the Configure Working Sets... / Select Working Sets dialog

NPE is:

My guess here is that you're not exposing your icons correctly so that other views can re-use them. Or, that your definition of a Working Set is different from that of the ones used by the Package Explorer.

Created an attachment (id=74407)
missing icons in explorer view and dialog
Change the php work set icon.
